p.k: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week, the band SILENT SIREN report on a unique rock festival where 1,000 people play a song together. Plus, we hear from Sukimaswitch and Yabai T-Shirts Yasan.
p.d: Japan's exciting music scene! Pop, rock, traditional and more! Live performances, artist interviews, plus all the latest news and video releases!
